summary: This is a memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated August 12, 2019, documenting information passed from the Special Housing Unit regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein. It notes that on August 9, 2019, staff were informed that Epstein was going to the WAB (likely a facility area) and might not return, and that he would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced in the memorandum, identified by number V6318-0541, who was going to the WAB and would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.

events.title: Epstein's movement and cellmate request
events.description: On August 9, 2019, at approximately 1:50 p.m., staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center were informed that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was going to the WAB and might not return, and that he would need a cellmate upon arrival from his attorney visit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: The document is a memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated August 12, 2019.
It records information passed from the Special Housing Unit regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein on August 9, 2019.
Staff were informed that Epstein was going to the WAB and might not return, and that he would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.
The document is dated two days after Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019, suggesting it may be part of post-incident documentation or review.
Epstein's inmate number is listed as V6318-0541.
